oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch - 1950-04-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch, originally broadcast 1950-04-22 (part 2) over the CBS network. Featuring Gene Autry, Johnny Bond, Pat Buttram, the Cass County Boys, the Pinafores, Carl Cotner, with announcer Charlie Lyon. Sponsored by Wrigley's Gum.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gene Autry; Cass County Boys; Pinafores; Carl Cotner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cast talk -- Wrigley's Gum commercial (Gene Autry) -- I Love You Because (Gene Autry) -- Cast talk -- Gene Autry introduces the radio play -- Radio play [continued in part 3]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; Gene Autry's Melody Ranch (Radio program); Cass County Boys (Musical group); Bond, Johnny, 1915-1978; Buttram, Pat; Pinafores (Musical group); Cotner, Carl; Lyon, Charles, 1903-1985; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.);
